title: Help I was just banned
body:
I just finished a game and was banned when I was queueing up for another. I don't know why.

http://prntscr.com/f17bw7

http://prntscr.com/f17ccc

I don't have access to the email so I can't see why. Help please

replies.body: Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to offer more context individually with you.  Due to the nature of sensitive account information, it's not really something we can discuss on the boards.  See you there!
